name: Roast Beef with Coffee
author: karela
summary: Don't pass this up because it sounds strange. It is wonderful! Serve with mashed potatoes. This can also be made with a sirloin tip roast or a rump roast.
directions: Preheat slow cooker to low setting OR preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Using a sharp knife, make 5 or 6 deep slits around the top and side of the roast
Push the whole cloves of garlic down into the slits
Place the meat in a slow cooker OR a 10x15 inch roasting pan and pour the coffee over the meat
Cook in slow cooker on low setting for 6 to 8 hours OR bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 2 to 3 hours
When roast is done, remove from slow cooker OR oven, and pour the drippings into a small saucepan over medium low heat
In a separate small bowl, combine the cornstarch and water
Mix well and add slowly to the drippings, stirring constantly
